attributes.action: Enforce the discipline in schools to stop bullying no more verbal warnings
attributes.additional_details:
For what the school can and should be doing:
https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/488034/Behaviour_and_Discipline_in_Schools_-_A_guide_for_headteachers_and_School_Staff.pdf

Facts and statistics, advice:
Bullying.co.uk 
http://www.anti-bullyingalliance.org.uk/

There are a lot of things the schools could be doing so they need to toughen up and crack down on these bullies. As one day it will save a life and the stress from a family.
attributes.background: A family member is getting bullied and the school have been informed several times but nothing has changed and the bullying is getting worse. A lot of verbal warnings and talks are being given but no action. So I want the verbal warnings to go and more discipline to help put an end to this.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure what action you would like to deal with bullying in schools. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask the Government to make a specific change to the guidance it gives to schools.  You could also sign one of the existing petitions on our site about bulling in schools.
